name: nonsecretory
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(of a body part or disease) not causing a liquid to be produced and released: About one-fifth of these tumours are nonsecretory. A chicken's crop is a nonsecretory organ whose function is to store undigested food. Related word
secrete
More examplesFewer examplesA very small percentage of the patients have a nonsecretory form of the disease.The oesophageal epithelia have a predominantly non-secretory function.Nonsecretory tumours tend to be large and very aggressive.Patients with nonsecretory myeloma do not have any monoclonal protein in their serum or urine.
